trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> class represents the extended protection policy used by the server to validate incoming client connections.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> representa a política de proteção estendida usada pelo servidor para validar as conexões de entrada do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Any classes that expose the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class should not allow the setting of null policies, should supply a default policy, or should require an explicit policy to be created and set by the application developer or administrator.
trans-unit.target: Todas as classes que expõem o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> classe não deve permitir que a configuração de políticas nulo, deve fornecer uma política padrão ou deve exigir uma diretiva explícita para ser criado e definido pelo administrador ou desenvolvedor de aplicativos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> que indica quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> que especifica quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario.TransportSelected>.
trans-unit.target: Quando este construtor é usado para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> classe, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> está definida como o `policyEnforcement` parâmetro e o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario.TransportSelected>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance that contains the information that is required to serialize the new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> que contém as informações necessárias para serializar a nova instância <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> que contém a origem do fluxo serializado associado à nova instância <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> class from a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that contains the required data to populate the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> que contém os dados necessários para popular o <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface for the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor implementa o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=nameWithType> a interface para o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData%2A> method can be used to serialize an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData%2A> método pode ser usado para serializar uma <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This serialized object can then be used with <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29> to construct a new <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto serializado, em seguida, pode ser usado com <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29> para construir uma nova <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> que indica quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding" /> that contains a custom channel binding to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding" /> que contém uma associação de canal personalizado a ser usado para validação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced and the channel binding token (CBT) to be used.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> que especifica quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta e o CBT (token de associação de canal) a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A> property is set to the `customChannelBinding` parameter, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario.TransportSelected>.
trans-unit.target: Quando este construtor é usado para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> classe, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> está definida como o `policyEnforcement` parâmetro, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomChannelBinding%2A> está definida como o `customChannelBinding` parâmetro e o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario.TransportSelected>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="policyEnforcement" /> is specified as <see cref="F:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="policyEnforcement" /> é especificado como <see cref="F:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="customChannelBinding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="customChannelBinding" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> que indica quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> que indica o tipo de proteção imposto pela política.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> que contém a lista SPN personalizada que é usada para estabelecer uma correspondência com o SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced, the kind of protection enforced by the policy, and a custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> que especifica quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta, o tipo de proteção imposta pela política e uma lista de SPN (Nome de Provedor de Serviço) personalizada que é usada para estabelecer uma correspondência com o SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to the `protectionScenario` parameter, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> property is set to the `customServiceNames` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando este construtor é usado para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> classe, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> está definida como o `policyEnforcement` parâmetro, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> está definida como o `protectionScenario` parâmetro e o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> está definida como o `customServiceNames` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="policyEnforcement" /> is specified as <see cref="F:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="policyEnforcement" /> é especificado como <see cref="F:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="customServiceNames" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty list.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="customServiceNames" /> é <see langword="null" /> ou uma lista vazia.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> que indica quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> que indica o tipo de proteção imposto pela política.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection" /> that contains the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection" /> que contém a lista SPN personalizada que é usada para estabelecer uma correspondência com o SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> class that specifies when the extended protection policy should be enforced, the kind of protection enforced by the policy, and a custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> que especifica quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta, o tipo de proteção imposta pela política e uma lista de SPN (Nome de Provedor de Serviço) personalizada que é usada para estabelecer uma correspondência com o SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to the `policyEnforcement` parameter, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to the `protectionScenario` parameter, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> property is set to the `customServiceNames` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando este construtor é usado para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> classe, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.PolicyEnforcement%2A> está definida como o `policyEnforcement` parâmetro, o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.ProtectionScenario%2A> está definida como o `protectionScenario` parâmetro e o <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.CustomServiceNames%2A> está definida como o `customServiceNames` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="policyEnforcement" /> is specified as <see cref="F:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="policyEnforcement" /> é especificado como <see cref="F:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="customServiceNames" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty list.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="customServiceNames" /> é <see langword="null" /> ou uma lista vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a custom channel binding token (CBT) to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um CBT (token de associação de canal) personalizado a ser usado para validação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding" /> that contains a custom channel binding to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ChannelBinding" /> que contém uma associação de canal personalizado a ser usado para validação.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property represents a custom channel binding token to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade somente leitura representa um token de associação de canal personalizado para usar para validação.

trans-unit.source: This is used in advanced scenarios when the CBT is provided by a custom outer channel.
trans-unit.target: Isso é usado em cenários avançados quando o CBT é fornecido por um canal externo personalizado.

trans-unit.source: An example scenario might use this property in combination with <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> and <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.
trans-unit.target: Um cenário de exemplo pode usar essa propriedade em combinação com <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> e <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista SPN (Nome do Provedor de Serviços) personalizado usada para correspondência com o SPN.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection" /> that contains the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection" /> que contém a lista SPN personalizada que é usada para estabelecer uma correspondência com o SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates the custom SPN list that is used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade somente leitura indica a lista SPN personalizada que é usada para estabelecer uma correspondência SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: By default, the server will determine a default SPN list according to its registered endpoints.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o servidor determina uma lista SPN padrão acordo com seus pontos de extremidade registrados.

trans-unit.source: For scenarios which require SPN checking, this property can be specified using a using a constructor to override the default list used to match against the client’s SPN.
trans-unit.target: Para cenários que exigem a verificação do SPN, essa propriedade pode ser especificada usando a usar um construtor para substituir a lista padrão usada para correspondência com o SPN do cliente.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the operating system supports integrated windows authentication with extended protection.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o sistema operacional dá suporte à autenticação integrada do Windows com proteção estendida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the operating system supports integrated windows authentication with extended protection, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o sistema operacional oferece suporte à autenticação integrada do windows com proteção estendida, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The changes to support extended protection are currently available for applications on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.
trans-unit.target: As alterações para oferecer suporte a proteção estendida estão atualmente disponíveis para aplicativos no Windows 7 e Windows Server 2008 R2.

trans-unit.source: The extended protection features will be made available as updates for Windows Vista and Windows Server 2008.
trans-unit.target: Os recursos de proteção estendida serão disponibilizados como atualizações para o Windows Vista e Windows Server 2008.

trans-unit.source: The extended protection features are not available on earlier versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Os recursos de proteção estendida não estão disponíveis em versões anteriores do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Gets when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Obtém quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> que indica quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates when extended protection policy should be enforced (always, when supported by clients, or never).
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade somente leitura indica quando a política de proteção estendida deve ser imposta (sempre, ao suporte pelos clientes, ou nunca).

trans-unit.source: Gets the kind of protection enforced by the extended protection policy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de proteção imposto pela política de proteção estendida.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> que indica o tipo de proteção imposto pela política.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade somente leitura indica o tipo de proteção aplicado pela política.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that holds the serialized data for an <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> que contém os dados serializados para um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains the destination of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> que contém o destino do fluxo serializado associado ao novo <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object with the required data to serialize an <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Popula um objeto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> com os dados necessários para serializar um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData%2A> method can be used to serialize an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData%2A> método pode ser usado para serializar uma <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This serialized object can then be used with <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29> to construct a new <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> object.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto serializado, em seguida, pode ser usado com <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy.%23ctor%28System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo%2CSystem.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext%29> para construir uma nova <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation for the extended protection policy instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma representação de cadeia de caracteres para a instância de política de proteção estendida.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> instance that contains the representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém a representação da instância <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.
